title: FS: T3 Bransfield PSA 4 Checklist back
author: x2drich2000

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Bransfield PSA 4 Checklist back
posts.post_content:
Have for sale a T3 Kitty Bransfield card with a checklist back.  Graded PSA 4 - VG-EX.  See scans below.  Asking $1100 dlvd in the US.  Payment by check (will hold to clear), money order, or Paypal friends and family. Regular Paypal is fine, if you cover the fees.  Any questions, please let me know.

Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u394/x2drich2000/ebay/PRE-WAR/t3%20bransfield%20f.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u394/x2drich2000/ebay/PRE-WAR/t3%20bransfield%20b.jpg[/IMG]
Bransfield was definitely a toughie when I put together the T3s six or seven years ago. Had to pray like hell to find one. That's a right smart looking card. Good luck with the sale.

Bump...price cut to $1000 dlvd.

Thanks 
DJ

Bump...with a temporary price reduction to $875 dlvd.  

Any questions, please let me know.
